page.title: 13ARMED FORCES
page.content: THE POLICE STATION IN MIDDLETOWN IS JOINTLY MANNED BY THE POLICE AND THE BRITISH ARMY.THE FORMER OCCUPY ABOUT 10% OF THE BUILDINGS .THE ARMY PERSONNEL HERE CHANGE EVERY FEW MONTHS WHEN A NEW REGIMENT COMES TO THE AREA. SEARGENT ABBOTT IS IN CHARGE OF THIS STATION .THE POLICE HERE ARE BACKED UP BY ARMAGH POLICE SO THAT ANY EXTRA HELP MAY BE HAD IN A MATTER OF MINUTES.THERE ARE NO FACILITIES HERE FOR DETAINING ANY LAW BREAKERS.THE ARMAGH POLICE WOMEN SERVE THIS AREA,POLICE DOGS AND THEIR HANDLERS ALSO COME FROM ARMAGH WHEN NEEDED. OUR POLICE FORCE ARE EQUIPPED WITH TELEX AND RADIO EQUIPMENT.ALL POLICE CARS ARE NOW BULLET PROOF,AND THERE IS A HELICOPTER LANDIND PAD NORTH OF THE STATION.
